overview: Bareback Ranchers 2, the wonderful follow-up, picks up with the developing attraction between Tommy Sem and Milan Breeze. They're joined by a ton of bronco-busting wranglers who are a little "light in the saddle" but oh-so-long in their jeans. Monster-dicked Steve Rives, fun-loving Jerry Wheeler, smoldering Sebastian DeLong, and playful Aaron Hawke join fan-favorites Patrik Maxwell and Mark Zebro for some more bareback fucking that culminates in a ten-cowboy orgy in the bunk room. Ride 'em cowboys!
title: Bareback Ranchers 2
